channel.title: Starter Items (Need Help)
channel.description: Heey does somebody knows how to change the items you start with in your inv? Like in mine server you start with 1 whip, how i change that to 1 shortbow?

item.title: Starter Items (Need Help)
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

its inside of playerhandeler.java if you just wanna make like a starter command its simple

[code]

    if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) {	
        if (starter == 0) {
            addItem(id, ammount);
            addItem(id, ammount);
            addItem(id, ammount);
            addItem(id, ammount);
            addItem(id, ammount);
            sendMessage("Go to the skilling area for more money.");
            starter = 1;
            savemoreinfo();
            savechar();
        } else if (starter == 1) {
            sendMessage("Sorry " + playerName + ", but... ");
            PlayerHandler.me]ssageToAll = (playerName
                    + " tried getting more than one starter package! ");

        }

[/code[/code]

Read full topic
